citl.hero_title: The ISTQB Certification Body in Ivory Coast
citl.hero_description: The Ivorian Software Testing Committee (CITL) is the only official structure in Ivory Coast responsible for representing and promoting ISTQB. We deliver ISTQB certifications, accredit trainers and actively participate in international software testing standards.
citl.overview_description: The Ivorian Software Testing Committee (CITL) was founded on **October 24, 2025** at the **ISTQB (International Software Testing Qualification Board)** general assembly in Copenhagen, Denmark. As a **non-profit organization**, it remains the **only official structure in Ivory Coast** responsible for representing and promoting ISTQB. In this capacity, CITL **delivers ISTQB certifications**, **independently accredits trainers** and training organizations, and **actively participates in ISTQB® activities**.
citl.overview_item_2: Benefit from training provided by accredited organizations
citl.overview_item_3: Join a community of certified testers
citl.overview_item_4: Develop your skills according to international standards
citl.takeaway_1: CITL is the only official ISTQB body in Ivory Coast
citl.takeaway_2: We offer 6 certification levels for all profiles
citl.takeaway_3: Our certifications are recognized in over 120 countries
citl.conclusion: CITL is committed to promoting software testing excellence in Ivory Coast. By joining our community, you gain access to globally recognized certifications, quality training, and a network of qualified professionals.

istqb.hero_description: ISTQB is the global reference for software testing certification, founded in 1998. Its mission is to support the testing community and promote software quality on a global scale.
istqb.overview_description: The **International Software Testing Qualifications Board (ISTQB®)** is the **world leader** in software testing certifications. Founded in **1998**, it has established **internationally recognized standards** that help professionalize the software testing field. ISTQB operates through **national member boards** in **over 120 countries**, ensuring global consistency while adapting to local needs. The **ISTQB® Certified Tester program** has become the **industry standard**, with millions of certifications delivered worldwide.
istqb.overview_item_3: Continuously updated syllabi and best practices
istqb.overview_item_4: Multi-level certification path for career growth
istqb.takeaway_1: ISTQB certifications are recognized by employers worldwide
istqb.takeaway_2: Structured learning paths from foundation to expert level
istqb.takeaway_3: Access to a global community of testing professionals
istqb.conclusion: ISTQB provides the framework for professional software testing excellence. Whether you're starting your testing career or advancing to expert level, ISTQB certifications demonstrate your commitment to quality and professional standards.

vision.hero_description: To be the leading force in promoting software quality and testing excellence across Ivory Coast and the broader African region.
vision.overview_description: CITL envisions becoming the **cornerstone of software testing excellence** in Ivory Coast and a **model for the African region**. We aim to **elevate the software testing profession** by establishing high standards, fostering a culture of quality, and creating pathways for professional growth. Our vision extends beyond certifications – we seek to **transform the perception of software testing** from a technical necessity to a **strategic business enabler**. By building partnerships with industry, academia, and government, we strive to create an **ecosystem where quality is valued** and testing professionals are recognized as key contributors to technological advancement.
vision.overview_item_1: Establish Ivory Coast as a hub for software testing excellence
vision.overview_item_2: Create pathways for continuous professional development
vision.overview_item_3: Foster collaboration between industry and education
vision.overview_item_4: Promote quality culture across all technology sectors
vision.takeaway_1: Position CITL as the reference for software testing in West Africa
vision.takeaway_2: Develop local expertise aligned with international standards
vision.takeaway_3: Create opportunities for knowledge sharing and innovation
vision.conclusion: Our vision drives every initiative we undertake. We believe that by investing in software testing excellence today, we're building a foundation for technological innovation and economic growth tomorrow. Join us in making this vision a reality.
vision.missions_description: CITL is committed to several strategic missions to promote and develop the software testing profession in Ivory Coast.
vision.mission_1: CITL is responsible for **establishing a reliable, consistent and transparent accreditation system**, aimed at accrediting trainers and training organizations.
vision.mission_2: CITL raises awareness of the importance of testing by organizing **workshops, seminars and events** on professional practices and standards.
vision.mission_3: We offer **ISTQB certifying training**, covering different levels to train qualified professionals capable of ensuring software quality in business.
vision.mission_4: We organize and deliver **exams and certifications** for software testers.
vision.mission_5: We work to build an **active and dynamic testing community**, setting up working groups and encouraging the exchange of best practices.
vision.mission_6: Beyond certification, CITL aims to promote a **culture of quality** in Ivorian organizations, fostering continuous improvement for the success of their IT projects.

missions.hero_description: CITL's missions focus on delivering certifications, building capacity, and fostering a community dedicated to software quality excellence.
missions.overview_description: As the **official ISTQB representative** in Ivory Coast, CITL carries out critical missions that support the software testing community. We **administer ISTQB certification exams** across all levels, ensuring adherence to international standards. We **accredit training providers and instructors**, guaranteeing quality education for certification candidates. Beyond certifications, we **organize events, workshops, and knowledge-sharing sessions** to keep the community engaged with emerging trends and best practices. We also **advocate for software quality** with stakeholders in government, industry, and academia, promoting the value of professional testing in digital transformation initiatives.
missions.overview_item_4: Advocate for quality and testing standards
missions.takeaway_2: Building capacity through accredited training programs
missions.takeaway_3: Creating a vibrant community of practice
missions.conclusion: Our missions are designed to serve the testing community at every level – from aspiring testers seeking their first certification to experienced professionals pursuing expert-level credentials. Through our work, we're building infrastructure for software quality excellence.

executive_board.hero_description: Meet the dedicated professionals guiding CITL's mission to promote software testing excellence in Ivory Coast.
executive_board.overview_description: The CITL Executive Board brings together **experienced professionals** from diverse backgrounds in software testing, quality assurance, and technology management. Board members are **elected by CITL members** and serve **defined terms** to ensure fresh perspectives and continuity. The Board is responsible for **strategic direction**, **policy development**, and **operational oversight** of all CITL activities. Members participate in **ISTQB international meetings**, ensuring CITL remains aligned with global standards while addressing local needs. The Board operates with **transparency and accountability**, reporting regularly to the membership and stakeholders.
executive_board.overview_item_3: Represent CITL at national and international forums
executive_board.takeaway_1: Committed to transparency and member engagement
executive_board.takeaway_2: Experienced professionals with proven track records
executive_board.takeaway_3: Dedicated to serving the testing community
executive_board.conclusion: The Executive Board's leadership ensures that CITL remains focused on its mission while adapting to evolving needs of the software testing community. Board members volunteer their time and expertise to advance the profession and create opportunities for all members.

why_certification.hero_description: ISTQB® certifications are **globally recognized** and serve as proof of competence and expertise in software testing. They open career opportunities and enhance your professional profile.
why_certification.content_description:
High-Quality Training Programs

All syllabi (programs) are developed and reviewed by recognized testing professionals from both academia and industry.

Global Recognition

Certifications are recognized internationally through the consistent application of ISTQB® policies and procedures by its member boards.

Common Language

The ISTQB® glossary provides a shared vocabulary for the entire profession.

Public Access

The glossary and syllabi of ISTQB® are freely accessible on the official ISTQB® website and on member board sites, in different local languages.

Continuous Improvement

Syllabi and other documents are constantly updated to meet the needs of organizations worldwide and to keep pace with the evolution of the profession.

Professional Credibility

Being certified offers benefits for both individuals and organizations, ensuring that testing professionals meet the high standards established by ISTQB®.
